history.proof: intros v H. destruct v. - auto. - shelve.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
L: Language
codeF: Functions L -> nat
codeR: Relations L -> nat
codeArityR: nat -> nat
codeArityF: nat -> nat
codeArityFIsPR: isPR 1 codeArityF
codeArityFIsCorrect1: forall f : Functions L, codeArityF (codeF f) = S (arity L (inr f))
codeArityFIsCorrect2: forall n : nat, codeArityF n <> 0 -> exists f : Functions L, codeF f = n
codeArityRIsPR: isPR 1 codeArityR
codeArityRIsCorrect1: forall r : Relations L, codeArityR (codeR r) = S (arity L (inl r))
codeArityRIsCorrect2: forall n : nat, codeArityR n <> 0 -> exists r : Relations L, codeR r = n
codeFInj: forall f g : Functions L, codeF f = codeF g -> f = g
codeRInj: forall R S : Relations L, codeR R = codeR S -> R = S
T: System
TextendsNN: Included (fol.Formula LNN) NN T
U: fol.System L
fU: Formula
v0: nat
freeVarfU: forall v : nat, In v (freeVarFormula LNN fU) -> v = v0
expressU1: forall f : fol.Formula L, mem (fol.Formula L) U f -> SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNN fU v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula L codeF codeR f)))
expressU2: forall f : fol.Formula L, ~ mem (fol.Formula L) U f -> SysPrf T (notH (substituteFormula LNN fU v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula L codeF codeR f))))

Goal:
forall v : nat, In v (freeVarFormula LNN codeSysPrfNot) -> v <= 1

Premises:
natToTerm = fix natToTerm (n : nat) : Term := match n with | 0 => Zero | S m => Succ (natToTerm m) end : nat -> Term Arguments natToTerm _%nat_scope
SysPrf = folProof.SysPrf LNN : fol.System LNN -> fol.Formula LNN -> Prop
inl : ?A -> ?A + ?B where ?A : [L : Language codeF : Functions L -> nat codeR : Relations L -> nat codeArityF : nat -> nat codeArityR : nat -> nat codeArityFIsPR : isPR 1 codeArityF codeArityFIsCorrect1 : forall f : Functions L, codeArityF (codeF f) = S (arity L (inr f)) codeArityFIsCorrect2 : forall n : nat, codeArityF n <> 0 -> exists f : Functions L, codeF f = n codeArityRIsPR : isPR 1 codeArityR codeArityRIsCorrect1 :
NN = Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Singleton (fol.Formula LNN) NN1) NN2) NN3) NN4) NN5) NN6) NN7) NN8) NN9 : Ensemble (fol.Formula LNN)
Included : forall U : Type, Ensemble U -> Ensemble U -> Prop
arity : forall l : Language, Relations l + Functions l -> nat
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
substituteFormula : forall L : Language, fol.Formula L -> nat -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L
System = fol.System LNN : Type
isPR : forall n : nat, extEqualNat.naryFunc n -> Set
Record Language : Type := language { Relations : Set; Functions : Set; arity : Relations + Functions -> nat } Arguments language (_ _)%type_scope _%function_scope
codeFormula : forall L : Language, (Functions L -> nat) -> (Relations L -> nat) -> fol.Formula L -> nat
Functions = fun l : Language => let (Relations, Functions, _) := l in Functions : Language -> Set
mem : forall U : Type, Ensemble U -> U -> Prop
LNN = {| Relations := LNNRelation; Functions := LNTFunction; arity := LNNArity |} : Language
inr : ?B -> ?A + ?B where ?A : [L : Language codeF : Functions L -> nat codeR : Relations L -> nat codeArityF : nat -> nat codeArityR : nat -> nat codeArityFIsPR : isPR 1 codeArityF codeArityFIsCorrect1 : forall f : Functions L, codeArityF (codeF f) = S (arity L (inr f)) codeArityFIsCorrect2 : forall n : nat, codeArityF n <> 0 -> exists f : Functions L, codeF f = n codeArityRIsPR : isPR 1 codeArityR codeArityRIsCorrect1 :
freeVarFormula : forall L : Language, fol.Formula L -> list nat
Relations = fun l : Language => let (Relations, Functions, _) := l in Relations : Language -> Set
notH = fol.notH LNN : fol.Formula LNN -> fol.Formula LNN
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
codeSysPrfNot = existH 2 (andH (substituteFormula LNN codeSysPrf 0 (var 2)) (substituteFormula LNN (substituteFormula LNN (primRecFormula 1 (proj1_sig codeNotIsPR)) 0 (var 2)) 1 (var 0))) : fol.Formula LNN
Formula = fol.Formula LNN : Set
checkPrfCorrect2 : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat) (codeR : Relations L -> nat) (codeArityF codeArityR : nat -> nat), (forall f : Functions L, codeArityF (codeF f) = S (arity L (inr f))) -> (forall n : nat, codeArityF n <> 0 -> exists f : Functions L, codeF f = n) -> (forall r : Relations L, codeArityR (codeR r) = S (arity L (inl r))) -> (forall n : nat, codeArityR n <> 0 -> exists r : Relations L, codeR r = n) ->...-> exists f : fol.Formula L, codeFormula L codeF codeR f = n /\ (exists (l : list (fol.Formula L)) (p : Prf L l f), codePrf L codeF codeR l f p = m)
wellFormedFormulaCorrect2 : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat) (codeArityF : nat -> nat), (forall f : Functions L, codeArityF (codeF f) = S (arity L (inr f))) -> (forall n : nat, codeArityF n <> 0 -> exists f : Functions L, codeF f = n) -> forall (codeR : Relations L -> nat) (codeArityR : nat -> nat), (forall r : Relations L, codeArityR (codeR r) = S (arity L (inl r))) -> (forall n : nat, codeArityR n <> 0 -> exists r : Relations L, codeR r = n) -> forall n : nat, wellFormedFormula codeArityF codeArityR n <> 0 -> exists f : fol.Formula L, codeFormula L codeF codeR f = n
codeFormulaInj : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat) (codeR : Relations L -> nat), (forall f g : Functions L, codeF f = codeF g -> f = g) -> (forall R S : Relations L, codeR R = codeR S -> R = S) -> forall f g : fol.Formula L, codeFormula L codeF codeR f = codeFormula L codeF codeR g -> f = g
wellFormedFormulaCorrect1 : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat) (codeArityF : nat -> nat), (forall f : Functions L, codeArityF (codeF f) = S (arity L (inr f))) -> forall (codeR : Relations L -> nat) (codeArityR : nat -> nat), (forall r : Relations L, codeArityR (codeR r) = S (arity L (inl r))) -> forall f : fol.Formula L, wellFormedFormula codeArityF codeArityR (codeFormula L codeF codeR f) = 1
checkPrfCorrect1 : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat) (codeR : Relations L -> nat) (codeArityF codeArityR : nat -> nat), (forall f : Functions L, codeArityF (codeF f) = S (arity L (inr f))) -> (forall r : Relations L, codeArityR (codeR r) = S (arity L (inl r))) -> forall (l : list (fol.Formula L)) (f : fol.Formula L) (p : Prf L l f), checkPrf L codeF codeR codeArityF codeArityR (codeFormula L codeF codeR f) (codePrf L codeF codeR l f p) = S (codeList (map (codeFormula L codeF codeR) l))
wellFormedTermCorrect2 : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat) (codeArityF : nat -> nat), (forall f : Functions L, codeArityF (codeF f) = S (arity L (inr f))) -> (forall n : nat, codeArityF n <> 0 -> exists f : Functions L, codeF f = n) -> forall n : nat, wellFormedTerm codeArityF n <> 0 -> exists t : fol.Term L, codeTerm L codeF t = n
codeSysPrfCorrect2 : forall (f : fol.Formula L) (A : fol.Formulas L), (exists g : fol.Formula L, In g A /\ ~ mem (fol.Formula L) U g) -> forall p : Prf L A f, SysPrf T (notH (substituteFormula LNN (substituteFormula LNN codeSysPrf 0 (natToTerm (codeFormula L codeF codeR f))) 1 (natToTerm (codePrf L codeF codeR A f p))))
codeTermInj : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat), (forall f g : Functions L, codeF f = codeF g -> f = g) -> forall t s : fol.Term L, codeTerm L codeF t = codeTerm L codeF s -> t = s
codeSubFormula.codeSubFormulaCorrect : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat) (codeR : Relations L -> nat) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), codeSubFormula.codeSubFormula (codeFormula L codeF codeR f) v (codeTerm L codeF s) = codeFormula L codeF codeR (substituteFormula L f v s)
checkPrfIsPR : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat) (codeR : Relations L -> nat) (codeArityF codeArityR : nat -> nat), isPR 1 codeArityF -> isPR 1 codeArityR -> isPR 2 (checkPrf L codeF codeR codeArityF codeArityR)
codeTermsInj : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat), (forall f g : Functions L, codeF f = codeF g -> f = g) -> forall (n : nat) (ts ss : fol.Terms L n), codeTerms L codeF n ts = codeTerms L codeF n ss -> ts = ss
codeImpCorrect : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat) (codeR : Relations L -> nat) (a b : fol.Formula L), codeImp (codeFormula L codeF codeR a) (codeFormula L codeF codeR b) = codeFormula L codeF codeR (fol.impH L a b)
codeIffCorrect : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat) (codeR : Relations L -> nat) (a b : fol.Formula L), codeIff (codeFormula L codeF codeR a) (codeFormula L codeF codeR b) = codeFormula L codeF codeR (fol.iffH L a b)
codeFreeVar.codeFreeVarFormulaCorrect : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat) (codeR : Relations L -> nat) (f : fol.Formula L), codeFreeVar.codeFreeVarFormula (codeFormula L codeF codeR f) = codeList (freeVarFormula L f)
minimize1 : forall (A B : Formula) (v x : nat), v <> x -> ~ In x (freeVarFormula LNN B) -> forall a : nat, SysPrf NN (substituteFormula LNN A v (natToTerm a)) -> SysPrf NN (substituteFormula LNN B v (natToTerm a)) -> (forall b : nat, b < a -> SysPrf NN (notH (substituteFormula LNN A v (natToTerm b)))) -> (forall b : nat, b < a -> SysPrf NN (notH (substituteFormula LNN B v (natToTerm b)))) -> SysPrf NN (iffH (andH A (forallH x (impH (LT (var x) (var v)) (notH (substituteFormula LNN B v (var x)))))) (equal (var v) (natToTerm a)))
Formula_ind : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Formula L -> Prop), (forall t t0 : fol.Term L, P (fol.equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (atomic L r t)) -> (forall f1 : fol.Formula L, P f1 -> forall f2 : fol.Formula L, P f2 -> P (fol.impH L f1 f2)) -> (forall f2 : fol.Formula L, P f2 -> P (fol.notH L f2)) -> (forall (n : nat) (f3 : fol.Formula L), P f3 -> P (fol.forallH L n f3)) -> forall f4 : fol.Formula L, P f4
codeFreeVar.codeFreeVarListFormulaCorrect : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat) (codeR : Relations L -> nat) (l : list (fol.Formula L)), codeFreeVar.codeFreeVarListFormula (codeList (map (codeFormula L codeF codeR) l)) = codeList (freeVarListFormula L l)
folLogic.sysExtend : forall (L : Language) (T U : fol.System L) (f : fol.Formula L), Included (fol.Formula L) T U -> folProof.SysPrf L T f -> folProof.SysPrf L U f
sysExtend : forall (T U : System) (f : Formula), Included (fol.Formula LNN) T U -> SysPrf T f -> SysPrf U f
subFormulaNil : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (T : fol.System L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), ~ In v (freeVarFormula L f) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (substituteFormula L f v s) f)
forallI : forall (T : System) (f : Formula) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys LNN v T -> SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T (forallH v f)
reduceSub : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (f g : fol.Formula L), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L f g) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (substituteFormula L f v s) (substituteFormula L g v s))
Axm : forall (T : System) (f : Formula), mem (fol.Formula LNN) T f -> SysPrf T f
existI : forall (T : System) (f : Formula) (v : nat) (t : Term), SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNN f v t) -> SysPrf T (existH v f)
forallE : forall (T : System) (f : Formula) (v : nat) (t : Term), SysPrf T (forallH v f) -> SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNN f v t)
Inductive Term (L : Language) : Set := var : nat -> fol.Term L | apply : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L with Terms (L : Language) : nat -> Set := Tnil : fol.Terms L 0 | Tcons : forall n : nat, fol.Term L -> fol.Terms L n -> fol.Terms L (S n) Arguments fol.var _ _%nat_scope Arguments fol.Terms _ _%nat_scope Arguments Tcons _ _%nat_scope
Inductive Formula (L : Language) : Set := equal : fol.Term L -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L | atomic : forall r : Relations L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r)) -> fol.Formula L | impH : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L | notH : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L | forallH : nat -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L Arguments fol.forallH _ _%nat_scope
LNT.sysExtend : forall (T U : LNT.System) (f : LNT.Formula), Included (fol.Formula LNT) T U -> LNT.SysPrf T f -> LNT.SysPrf U f
freeVarSubFormula3 : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarFormula L (substituteFormula L f v s)) -> In x (list_remove nat Nat.eq_dec v (freeVarFormula L f)) \/ In x (freeVarTerm L s)
sysWeaken : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T g) f
Inductive Prf (L : Language) : fol.Formulas L -> fol.Formula L -> Set := AXM : forall A : fol.Formula L, Prf L (A :: nil) A | MP : forall (Axm1 Axm2 : fol.Formulas L) (A B : fol.Formula L), Prf L Axm1 (fol.impH L A B) -> Prf L Axm2 A -> Prf L (Axm1 ++ Axm2) B | GEN : forall (Axm : fol.Formulas L) (A : fol.Formula L) (v : nat), ~ In v (freeVarListFormula L Axm) -> Prf L Axm A -> Prf L Axm (fol.forallH L v A) | IMP1 : forall A B : fol.Formula L, Prf L nil (fol.impH L A (fol.impH L B A)) | IMP2 : forall A B C : fol.Formula L, Prf L nil...
subWithEquals : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (a b : fol.Term L) (T : fol.System L), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.equal L a b) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L (substituteFormula L f v a) (substituteFormula L f v b))
impI : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T g) f -> SysPrf T (impH g f)
closedNatToTerm : forall a v : nat, ~ In v (freeVarTerm LNN (natToTerm a))
orSys : forall (T : System) (f g h : Formula), SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T f) h -> SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T g) h -> SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T (orH f g)) h
subFormulaExch : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (T : fol.System L) (v1 v2 : nat) (s1 s2 : fol.Term L), v1 <> v2 -> ~ In v2 (freeVarTerm L s1) -> ~ In v1 (freeVarTerm L s2) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (substituteFormula L (substituteFormula L f v1 s1) v2 s2) (substituteFormula L (substituteFormula L f v2 s2) v1 s1))
boundedLT : forall (m : nat) (a : Formula) (x : nat), (forall n : nat, n < m -> SysPrf NN (substituteFormula LNN a x (natToTerm n))) -> SysPrf NN (impH (LT (var x) (natToTerm m)) a)
subFormulaRelation : forall (L : Language) (r : Relations L) (ts : fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r))) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), substituteFormula L (atomic L r ts) v s = atomic L r (substituteTerms L (arity L (inl r)) ts v s)
contradiction : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T (notH f) -> SysPrf T g
codeNVarsCorrect : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat) (n : nat), codeNVars1 n = codeTerms L codeF n (fst (nVars L n)) /\ codeNVars2 n = codeTerms L codeF n (snd (nVars L n))

```coq
intros v H. destruct v.
- auto.
- auto.
```
